root.name: Aliens Versus Predator 2: Primal Hunt
root.description: Primal Hunt is an expansion pack set before the events of Alien Vs Predator 2.It once again features three separate (though considerably shorter) single player campaigns, and introduced three new classes that could also be used in multi player; The Ancient Predator, The PredAlien and the Corporate Marine.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows 95, 98, Me, 2000CPU: P3 450 or equivalent processorRAM: 128 MB RAMVGA: 16 MB DirectX 8-compatible D3D video cardDX: DirectX 8a or higherHDD: 750 MB free hard drive space (815 MB free space required if DirectX is not already installed)Sound: 16-bit DirectX 8-compatible sound cardODD: 4x or faster CD-ROM driveNetwork: 56k DirectPlay-compatible TCP-IP Internet connection for Internet play, or a NIC (Network Interface Card) and intranet connection for LAN playRecommendedOS: Windows 95, 98, Me, 2000CPU: P3 800 processorRAM: 256 MB RAMVGA: 32 MB DirectX 8-compatible D3D video cardDX: DirectX 8a or higherHDD: 1,2 GB Full Install with Multi-PlayerSound: 24-bit DirectX 8-compatible sound cardODD: 4x or faster CD-ROM driveNetwork: 56k DirectPlay-compatible TCP-IP Internet connection for Internet play, or a NIC (Network Interface Card) and intranet connection for LAN play
